name: medlink-backend
description: Backend services for National Medical Identity Network

scripts.build: prisma generate && prisma db push --accept-data-loss && tsc && npx tsx prisma/seed.ts
scripts.render:build: prisma generate && prisma db push --accept-data-loss && tsc
scripts.multi:generate: npm run multi:generate:central && npm run multi:generate:hospital
scripts.multi:push: npm run multi:push:central && npm run multi:push:hospitals
scripts.multi:setup: npm run multi:generate && npm run multi:push && npm run multi:seed
scripts.multi:reset: npm run multi:push && npm run multi:seed
scripts.render:multi:build: npm run multi:generate && npm run multi:push && tsc
